reviewText: My 20 month old loves this.  She has learned several new signs, but even more new words.

I took sign language while at Princeton University as a hobby, but if we had had this cd, I think it would have been even easier to remember and brush up in between our weekly lessons!  And now that I have children, the puppet characters make it fun for them to learn too! It is obvious that a lot of time and effort went into this cd. My 1year old signs as he says the words. The pictures and videos associated with the words make it great for my older child, too.
